text: That's Life! is a 1986 American comedy-drama movie directed by Blake Edwards and starring Jack Lemmon, Julie Andrews, Sally Kellerman, Robert Loggia, Jennifer Edwards, Rob Knepper, Chris Lemmon, Felicia Farr and Cynthia Sikes. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1987. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1986 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Blake Edwards Category:American independent movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:1980s English-language movies Category:1980s American drama movies Category:1980s independent movies Category:Movies about depression Category:Movies about marriage Category:Movies set in California
title: That's Life! (movie)
